Introduction

II Rina, also known as Jaeny and formerly known as Poorin, Jaeeun, or Park Jaeeun, is a South Korean singer, model, and voice actress. She is a former member of the girl groups Kirots, UNIZ, 4X, and the band Harmonitive. She made her solo debut on July 7, 2010, with the single album "처음." She is also known for participating in the survival shows Superstar K1 and Girls Frontier.
